products.name: Vintage record player
products.description: This is a vintage record player from the 1960s. It still works perfectly and comes with a set of vinyl records.

products.name: Antique rocking chair
products.description: This is an antique rocking chair from the 19th century. It's made of solid oak and has a beautiful carved back.

products.name: Used bicycle
products.description: This is a used bicycle in good condition. It has 21 speeds and comes with a lock and helmet.

products.name: Vintage typewriter
products.description: This is a vintage typewriter from the 1940s. It's in excellent condition and comes with a case.

products.name: Antique coffee table
products.description: This is an antique coffee table from the 1920s. It's made of mahogany and has a beautiful inlaid design.

products.name: Vintage camera
products.description: This is a vintage camera from the 1950s. It still works and comes with a leather case.

products.name: Used surfboard
products.description: This is a used surfboard in good condition. It's a shortboard and comes with a leash.

products.name: Original Picasso painting
products.description: This is an original painting by Pablo Picasso. It's a cubist work from his blue period and is signed by the artist.

products.name: Antique vase
products.description: This is an antique vase from the 18th century. It's made of porcelain and has a hand-painted floral design.

products.name: Used acoustic guitar
products.description: This is a used acoustic guitar in good condition. It comes with a soft case.
